definition: things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我们的价值观和民主权力而言，诸如此类都是如此。

sentences.english: It's used for objects such as string constants and classes.
sentences.chinese: 它用于诸如字符串常量和类之类的对象。

sentences.english: There are many other same-name cities all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此类的同名城市世界上还有许多。

sentences.english: The mechanical device that moves something , usually read/write head.
sentences.chinese: 一种机械装置，用于移动诸如读写磁头之类的部件。

sentences.english: We don't know how other critters breathe--lizards, for example.
sentences.chinese: 我们还不知道诸如蜥蜴之类的动物如何呼吸。

sentences.english: Parents were too shy to tackle embarrassing issues such as sex head-on.
sentences.chinese: 家长羞于跟孩子正面讨论诸如性这样的尴尬问题。

sentences.english: To talk about a water crisis hides intractable problems such as poverty.
sentences.chinese: 谈论水危机掩饰了诸如贫穷这样棘手的问题。

sentences.english: Materials such as iron, sheet metal and steel are painted white.
sentences.chinese: 诸如铁具，金属板材和钢均被涂成白色。

sentences.english: Give special consideration for operations such as these.
sentences.chinese: 应该对诸如此类的操作给予特殊考虑。

sentences.english: Molecular techniques such as gene knockout partially support the monoamine theory of depression.
sentences.chinese: 诸如基因部分敲除的分子技术支持抑郁症的单胺理论。

sentences.english: Employers could also adopt policies such as offering workers paid sick leave.
sentences.chinese: 雇主还可以采用诸如向雇员提供有薪病假的政策。

sentences.english: where we could have dinner and it was free of charge, that kind of thing.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在那里吃晚餐，而且完全免费，诸如此类的。

sentences.english: The claim was eventually retracted, one of several such retractions over the past several days.
sentences.chinese: 传闻最终收回，过去几天诸如此类的传闻相继收回。

sentences.english: I don't know, Taiwan, knowing people who might live in the UK or something like that.
sentences.chinese: 台湾的人，而这个人又认识住在英国的人，诸如此类。

sentences.english: HTU 1225 Now shut your eyes or whatever it is you do.
sentences.chinese: 现在闭上眼睛或者做诸如此类的事。

sentences.english: Little episodes such as these continued throughout Robert's life.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此类的小事儿，在罗伯特的一生中连续不断。

definition: et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
apart from this/in addition to this
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
